name: Typhlosion
author: Kazuyuki Kano
flavor_text: It attacks using blasts of fire. It creates heat shimmers with intense fire to hide itself.

poke_power.name: Firestarter
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may attach a {R} Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokémon. This power can’t be used if Typhlosion is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Evaporating Heat
attacks.effect: Discard a {W} Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.
